Oh and as to the concern of the cliffhanger this story has, I too frankly disliked It but sometimes a bittersweet ending feels better than the typical black or white one since as we all know and Maulana Rumi preached, everyone Is grey and everything In life Is grey. There Is a favorite poem of his I like and In It, there Is a line as follows: "I will meet you over there, beyond the idea of right doing and wrongdoing" and this author truly knows that mindset since he made a work of this nature.

From the way the art style was done to the flawlessly executed story and psychological aspect, this deserves the 10/10 rating and I implore others to view this work for every single thing It has to offer, since many times It Is not always about the fap, but how the fap started and how It actually ended and felt after, and truly my friends this hentai makes the fap 100X better than some typical normal hentai. Instant favorite.

This ending has ruined me emotionally. The story was fantastic and I have not seen It done often, The plot progression was great as well with the way the author showed the changing of their attitudes and the seasons going by. The psychological aspect was the best with the Immoral beginning and the moral ending In the sense of them both starting to become adults and before they were minors. I quite enjoyed the art style as well with the way the author detailed all the characters and all the various panels very equally, you notice often times that the first ten or so pages of a hentai are good but after that It goes downhill In terms of Its artistic nature, but this was clearly not the case here since the author truly cared about this work. The sex scenes were fantastic and the blowjob scene was decent enough...Truly I want to write so much for this work but due to word limits I cannot, to really summarize It I would say It Is the best work I have read this year

body: But what happened to Hotta? She just gone like that?

Wow it's such a good one, though it would be nice to have a more clarification on the ending. It feels sad and frustrating to think that they both parted ways and won't see each other again. As sweet as the story is, it would be even more sweeter with a more satisfying ending where they end up in a relationship. Rather than leaving us in uncertainty of what happens to them afterwards: whether they abide by Rule 7 (to treat each others as strangers outside the base) and consequently later Mishima finds another dude and similarly fucks them or whether both of them actually fell in love with each other and live in misery for the rest of their days. But then why would they make such a rule in the first place?

Me solely taking the time to think about it so much just proves how outstanding this doujin actually is, 10/10.
